rules.natural: If a research study is conducted on forest health, then the goal of sustainable management is achieved.
Whenever native trees species are planted, invasive plants species are removed.
If a task is assigned to the lead botanist, then in case it is not true that removing invasive plants species leads to preserving a protected zone area, a degraded section area is restored.
Either a task is assigned to the lead botanist or a task is assigned to the senior ecologist.

If a management strategy plan is approved, then whenever a task is assigned to the senior ecologist, then provided it is not true that removing invasive plants species results in preserving a protected zone area, a degraded section area is restored.
In the event that data on tree growth is collected, samples for soil quality are analyzed.
Assuming data on tree growth is collected, environmental factors parameters are measured.
Either access during visitor hours is reduced, or if a camera is installed at the monitoring station, then warning alerts signage is posted.
If the hiking path trail is maintained, then it is not the case that access during visitor hours is reduced.
Results are published in a peer journal or findings are presented at a conference.
Findings being presented at a conference implies that the goal of sustainable management is achieved.
Under the condition that the climate impact hypothesis is rejected, the growth cycle pattern is confirmed.
If the growth cycle pattern is confirmed, then a disease outbreak threat is identified.
Should the growth cycle pattern be confirmed, findings from a biodiversity survey are cataloged.
Provided that the growth cycle pattern is confirmed, rare plants species are not documented.

In case lab results are cross-checked, then if field observations data are verified, then under the condition that the growth cycle pattern is confirmed, it is not the case that a disease outbreak threat is identified.
Species diversity trends are forecasted or an ecosystem dynamics model is not created.
A proposal being reviewed by the research committee results in a management plan action being authorized.
If the work of the field team is supervised, then should it not be true that removing invasive plants species implies preserving a protected zone area, a degraded section area is restored.
Provided that the effort of the volunteer group is coordinated, responsibility is delegated to the team lead.
Responsibility being delegated to the team lead implies that if a task is assigned to the senior ecologist, then the work of the field team is supervised.

If the risk of fire hazard is assessed, then in the event that it is not the case that it is not true that not achieving the goal of sustainable management leads to regulating access to public trails implies closing a restricted section area, warning alerts signage is posted.

Given that the impact of human activity is evaluated, then if it is not true that it is not the case that not achieving the goal of sustainable management implies regulating access to public trails leads to closing a restricted section area, warning alerts signage is posted.

If the budget for project funding is approved, then provided it is not the case that the risk of fire hazard is assessed or the impact of human activity is evaluated, a mitigation strategy measure is implemented.
Either the records system database is updated, or if findings from a biodiversity survey are cataloged, then rare plants species are documented.
Under the condition that historical records data are archived, obsolete information files are deleted.
If historical records data are archived, then obsolete information files are not deleted.
Historical records data are archived or the records system database is not updated.
Correlation among environmental factors being analyzed implies that a disease outbreak threat is not identified.
Changes in seasonal patterns are documented or the activity of wildlife population is monitored or if samples for soil quality are analyzed, then a research study is conducted on forest health.
If an executive report summary is prepared, then findings are distributed across the research network.
Either an executive report summary is prepared or a presentation for a stakeholder meeting is created.

Under the condition that a presentation for a stakeholder meeting is created, then should it not be true that confirming the growth cycle pattern implies analyzing correlation among environmental factors, a conclusion on management effectiveness is drawn.

Whenever findings are distributed across the research network, then if it is not the case that confirming the growth cycle pattern results in analyzing correlation among environmental factors, a conclusion on management effectiveness is drawn.
If the nutrient cycle assumption is challenged, then the climate impact hypothesis is not rejected.
A symbiotic relationship theory being proposed leads to the nutrient cycle assumption being challenged.
Provided that evidence is supported by new data, then the claim from a previous study is not refuted.
Should the experimental design method be validated, then evidence is supported by new data.

If a report of management findings is submitted, then in the event that it is not true that not achieving the goal of sustainable management implies implementing a conservation protocol policy leads to allocating funding from research grants, funding from research grants is allocated.
Either an extension to the study period is requested or a report of management findings is submitted.
Provided that it is not the case that removing invasive plants species implies preserving a protected zone area, then a degraded section area is not restored.
Under the condition that it is not true that publishing results in a peer journal leads to achieving the goal of sustainable management, the climate impact hypothesis is rejected.
Whenever it is not true that confirming the growth cycle pattern results in analyzing correlation among environmental factors, a conclusion on management effectiveness is not drawn.

In the event that it is not the case that population data statistics are compiled or if environmental factors parameters are measured, then a research study is conducted on forest health, an ecosystem dynamics model is created.
Given that it is not the case that the risk of fire hazard is assessed or the impact of human activity is evaluated, a mitigation strategy measure is not implemented.

Provided that it is not the case that it is not true that not achieving the goal of sustainable management leads to regulating access to public trails implies closing a restricted section area, a camera is installed at the monitoring station.

Under the condition that it is not true that it is not the case that not achieving the goal of sustainable management implies regulating access to public trails results in closing a restricted section area, warning alerts signage is not posted.

Whenever it is not true that it is not the case that not achieving the goal of sustainable management leads to implementing a conservation protocol policy implies allocating funding from research grants, a proposal is reviewed by the research committee.
If it is not the case that it is not true that proposing a symbiotic relationship theory leads to accepting the established model premise, the claim from a previous study is refuted.

Under the condition that it is not the case that it is not true that proposing a symbiotic relationship theory results in accepting the established model premise, the experimental design method is validated.
If the goal of sustainable management is not achieved, native trees species are planted.
Given that the goal of sustainable management is not achieved, a protected zone area is not preserved.
In case the goal of sustainable management is not achieved, access to public trails is not regulated.

(A1 → G).natural: If a research study is conducted on forest health, then the goal of sustainable management is achieved.

(A11 → A12).natural: Whenever native trees species are planted, invasive plants species are removed.

(A2 → A1).natural: Data on tree growth being collected leads to a research study being conducted on forest health.

(A2 → A3).natural: In the event that data on tree growth is collected, samples for soil quality are analyzed.

(A2 → A30).natural: Assuming data on tree growth is collected, environmental factors parameters are measured.

(A22 → ¬A21).natural: If the hiking path trail is maintained, then it is not the case that access during visitor hours is reduced.

(A23 → G).natural: Provided that results are published in a peer journal, the goal of sustainable management is achieved.

(A23 ∨ A24).natural: Results are published in a peer journal or findings are presented at a conference.

(A25 → A26).natural: Under the condition that the climate impact hypothesis is rejected, the growth cycle pattern is confirmed.

(A33 ∨ ¬A32).natural: Species diversity trends are forecasted or an ecosystem dynamics model is not created.

(A35 → A34).natural: A proposal being reviewed by the research committee results in a management plan action being authorized.

(A36 → (¬(A12 → A10) → A13)).natural: If the work of the field team is supervised, then should it not be true that removing invasive plants species implies preserving a protected zone area, a degraded section area is restored.
